text:
Sony SAB is an Indian pay to air general Hindi entertainment channel which focussing on comedy contents.
History.
Sony SAB was launched by Adhikari brothers in 1999 as a Hindi language channel.
Later the channel rebranded as Hindi-general comedy entertainment channel and launches many iconic shows.
Sony SAB launches it's HD channel on 5 September 2015 on the occasion of Ganesh Chaturthi
